titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1908) to prohibit stock trading and ownership by Members of Congress and their spouses and dependent children, and for other purposes.
Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 1908) to prohibit stock trading and ownership by Members of Congress and their spouses and dependent children, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.
Motion to Discharge Committee filed by Mrs. Luna. Petition No: 119-11.
